" Bian " means good words, such as "Xunzi. "Feixiang": "Therefore, a gentleman is good at benevolent, he is ambition, he is safe, and he speaks happily, so a gentleman must argue." Yang Jie's note: "The argument means that you can talk." "Historical Records. "Confucius Family": "It is in the ancestral temple court to argue and argue, only Jiner."

" Debate " also means clever and beautiful words. Such as "Lao Tzu. Chapter 81: "The good one does not argue, the one who argues is not good" Heshang Gong's note: "To argue is to speak ingeniously." "Lu Shi Chunqiu. "On People": "People of the same kind are wise and distinguished, talents are not different, and they all speak cleverly to defend themselves. This is why the chaos is not the main reason."

" Debate " means governance. "Shuowen": "To argue, to govern." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "First Year of Zhao A.D.": "Who can argue for the masters of the Qi Alliance?" Du's note: "To argue, to rule." "Guan Zi. "Five Supplements": "The emperor chooses his ministers and becomes the official, the doctor serves as the official defense, the official holds the post, the scholar cultivates the body and the talent, the common people cultivate the farm and the tree."

" Debate " means to justify and correct. "Jade articles. "Yubu": "Ban, Zheng Ye." Such as "Yi Li. "Science meets ceremony": "Where the swallow sees the king, he must argue the south of the king." "Book of Rites. "Zeng Zi asked": "Kangzi worships Jiqi, and Sever argues." Kong Yingdashu: "Fear the prestige of Jizi, I dare not argue."

" Debate " means clear and methodical. Such as "Mozi. Self-cultivation": "The wise man argues but does not make complicated speeches, and he is multi-strength but does not cut his merits. This spreads the world with reputation." "New Book. "Daoshu": "Discussing things clearly argues for prestige, while counterarguing is awkward."

" Debate " means cleverness. "Guang Ya. Shi Gu Yi: "Bian, Hui Ye." Such as "Mo Zi. "Shang Tongzhong": "That's why I choose the world to praise and appreciate the virtuous, the sage knows and defends the wisdom of the people, and regards it as San Gong, and engages in the righteousness of the world." "Historical Records. "Li Si Biography": "Be kind and benevolent, light wealth and heavy scholars, argue with the heart and blame the mouth."

" Bian " means " discrimination ". Such as "Zhou Yi. "Xi Ci": "If a husband writes morals by miscellaneous things, and argues between right and wrong, it is not one of them." "Han Feizi. "Yang Quan": "Therefore, the name of the trial is based on positioning, and the clear distinction is used to argue."

" Debate " also on " change " represents a change. "Zhuangzi. "Xiaoyaoyou": "If you take advantage of the righteousness of the world, and the defense of the six qi, if you wander infinitely, you will be evil!" Guo Xiang's note: "The defense of the six qi is the painting of change. ."

humanum_full_description:
從「言」從「辡」，本義是爭辯。如《孟子．滕文公下》：「予豈好辯哉？予不得已也。」趙岐注：「好辯，好辯爭。」《淮南子．覽冥》：「得失之度，深微窈冥，難以知論，不可以辯說也。」

　　「辯」表示善言辭，如《荀子．非相》：「故君子之於善也，志好之，行安之，樂言之，故君子必辯。」楊倞注：「辯謂能談說也。」《史記．孔子世家》：「其於宗廟朝廷，辯辯言，唯謹爾。」

　　「辯」又表示巧言、言辭漂亮。如《老子．第八十一章》：「善者不辯，辯者不善」河上公注：「辯，謂巧言也。」《呂氏春秋．論人》：「人同類而智殊，賢不肖異，皆巧言辯辭，以自防禦，此不肖主之所以亂也。」

　　「辯」表示治理。《說文》：「辯，治也。」如《左傳．昭公元年》：「主齊盟者，誰能辯焉？」杜預注：「辯，治也。」 《管子．五輔》：「君擇臣而任官，大夫任官辯事，官長任事守職，士修身功材，庶人耕農樹蓺。」

　　「辯」表示辯正、糾正。《玉篇．辡部》：「辯，正也。」如《儀禮．士相見禮》：「凡燕見于君，必辯君之南面。」《禮記．曾子問》：「康子拜稽顙於位，有司弗辯也。」孔穎達疏：「畏季子之威，不敢辯正。」

　　「辯」表示清晰、有條理。如《墨子．脩身》：「慧者心辯而不繁說，多力而不伐功，此以名譽揚天下。」《新書．道術》：「論物明辯謂之辯，反辯為訥。」

　　「辯」表示聰慧。《廣雅．釋詁一》：「辯，慧也。」如《墨子．尚同中》：「是故選擇天下贊閱賢良、聖知辯慧之人，置以為三公，與從事乎一同天下之義。」《史記．李斯列傳》：「慈仁篤厚，輕財重士，辯於心而詘於口。」

　　「辯」通「辨」，表示分辨。如《周易．繫辭下》：「若夫雜物撰德，辯是與非，則非其中爻不備。」《韓非子．揚權》：「故審名以定位，明分以辯類。」

　　「辯」亦通「變」，表示變化。《莊子．逍遙遊》：「若夫乘天地之正，而御六氣之辯，以遊無窮者，彼且惡乎待哉！」郭象注：「御六氣之辯者，即是遊變化之塗也。」
